rec: The Man Who Knew Too Much (1956)
resp: If oyu like film noir, I would suggest The Third Man (1949) ... it is fantasticaly directed And if you are a Hitchock fan, I would suggest North by Northwest (1959) and The Man Who Knew Too Much (1956)
